about.story: I am 21 years old, born in 2002 April. I am training a pattern ready to code and discover the world of development. All ideas start simple, they say. They DO! I figured, and that's where I found my passion to discover the 'magic' behind computers.

projects.name: keyboard
projects.description: Just a fun looking keyboard I built to practice my css skills.

projects.name: calculator
projects.description: I tried to build a windows 10 look alike calculator. This was also javascript practice.

testimonials.name: Razeem
testimonials.quote: Rezaar is extremely focused. When he sinks hes teeth into something he does not let go. Hes everyone's go to guy and he's always willing to help. He showcases diligence and initiative daily and has a great sense of humor. Hes definately been a great addition to our team and im sure that he'll make an excellent addition to yours.

testimonials.name: Tamlin Leigh Geyer
testimonials.quote: Rezaar is an extraordinary full-stack developer whose technical prowess is matched only by his unwavering dedication to excellence. His ability to seamlessly navigate complex coding challenges and deliver elegant solutions is truly commendable. Beyond his technical brilliance, Rezaar collaborative spirit and infectious enthusiasm make him not just a valued colleague but also a cherished friend in the world of software development. I highly recommend him as a suitable candidate for any developer role.

testimonials.name: Ntokozo Sithebe
testimonials.quote: Rezaar is an intelligent individual, always willing to help where he can. He is passionate about his work and executes his creativity with excellence.

education.title: Casual Job
